scripts.client:build: cd client && npm install && npx vite build
scripts.build: cd server && npm install && npm run build && cd ../client && npm install && npx vite build
scripts.MaggieSays: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.deploy:heroku:subtree: git subtree push --prefix server heroku main
scripts.deploy:heroku:force: git push heroku `git subtree split --prefix server main`:main --force
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run MaggieSays && npm run build && npm run db:setup
